GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.14.290
GSD.description:
ip: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fwmark_reflect.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.290 by commit 5e7a1be3e68deef250ad43cc91f7bb8d7d758b48, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit e110861f86094cd78cc85593b873970092deb43a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ip: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fwmark_reflect.
